Name: [The Fungal Garden]
Description: Symbiotic Plate has consumed this chamber. Walls pulsate with living fungal masses. The air is thick with spores - you can see them drifting in the emergency lighting like toxic snow. What was once a maintenance bay is now a biological nightmare, every surface coated in wet, breathing growth.
NarrativeText: The Symbiotic Plate infestation is far more advanced here than anywhere else in [The Roots]. The fungal colony has developed primitive sensory organs - you can feel it watching you. The spores in the air make your head swim with alien thoughts.
FlavorText: Pustules on the walls leak luminescent fluid. You hear faint clicking sounds - the fungus communicating with itself. A Pre-Glitch warning sign barely visible through the growth reads: 'QUARANTINE - BIOLOGICAL HAZARD - DO NOT ENTER'
